Necromancer remains ducked low in the crater where he found cover. he kept =
his head high enough to see his opponents and his weapon aimed toward the m=
ob. The bot placed a scaled hand on his side fealing something draining out=
, "Slag, I'm worse than I thought." the bot had sprung a leak due to the in=
juries he'd taken. He wanted to transform so his repair systems could do th=
ier job but knew a giant dragon, especially a wounded one that couldn't fly=
 would be to easy a target to pass up.
